title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A scalable e-commerce solution with a .NET Core backend, featuring payment gateway integration and inventory management.
problem: The client needed a modern, high-performance online store to replace their outdated system, which was slow, difficult to manage, and not mobile-friendly.
solution: I led the development of a full-stack e-commerce platform using .NET Core for the backend API and React for the frontend. The solution included a secure payment gateway with Stripe, a real-time inventory management system, and a responsive user interface that works flawlessly on all devices.
features: Stripe integration for credit card payments
Admin dashboard for managing products and orders
